verses.verse: וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> And they continued שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years אֵ֚ין <WH369> without מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> without war בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> between Syria וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and Israel פ

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑ית <WH7992> And it came to pass in the third וַיֵּ֛רֶד <WH3381> came down יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> that Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> unto his servants הַיְדַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> Know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לָ֖נוּ רָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> ye that Ramoth גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> in Gilead וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we מַחְשִׁ֔ים <WH2814> [is] ours and we [be] still מִקַּ֣חַת <WH3947> [and] take אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> it not out of the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> Aram

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> unto Jehoshaphat הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> go אִתִּ֛י <WH854> for לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> with me to battle רָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <WH3092> to Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּמ֧וֹנִי <WH3644> I [am] as thou כָמ֛וֹךָ <WH3644> you כְּעַמִּ֥י <WH5971> [art] my people כְעַמֶּ֖ךָ <WH5971> as thy people כְּסוּסַ֥י <WH5483> my horses כְּסוּסֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5483> as thy horses

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel דְּרָשׁ־ <WH1875> Enquire נָ֥א <WH4994> Please כַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> to day אֶת־ <WH854> for דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> I pray thee at the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ץ <WH6908> together מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִיאִים֮ <WH5030> the prophets כְּאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> about four מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִישׁ֒ <WH376> men וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to הַאֵלֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> go עַל־ <WH5921> against רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle אִם־ <WH518> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <WH2308> or shall I forbear וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> ? And they said עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> Go up וְיִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> shall deliver אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> for the Lord בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat הַאֵ֨ין <WH369> is there פֹּ֥ה <WH6311> here נָבִ֛יא <WH5030> [Is there] not here a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD ע֑וֹד <WH5750> besides וְנִדְרְשָׁ֖ה <WH1875> that we might enquire מֵאוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <WH3092> unto Jehoshaphat ע֣וֹד <WH5750> is yet אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֡ד <WH259> [There is] yet one לִדְרֹשׁ֩ <WH1875> by whom we may enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵאֹת֜וֹ <WH853> וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I שְׂנֵאתִ֗יו <WH8130> but I hate כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִתְנַבֵּ֨א <WH5012> him for he doth not prophesy עָלַ֥י <WH5921> concerning טוֹב֙ <WH2896> good כִּ֣י <WH3588> because אִם־ <WH518> but רָ֔ע <WH7451> concerning me but evil מִיכָ֖יְהוּ <WH4321> Micaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִמְלָ֑ה <WH3229> of Imlah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אַל־ <WH408> nay יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> say הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Let not the king כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> called מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> about סָרִ֖יס <WH5631> officer אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> an וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מַהֲרָ֖ה <WH4116> Hasten מִיכָ֥יְהוּ <WH4321> [hither] Micaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יִמְלָֽה׃ <WH3229> of Imlah

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֡ה <WH3063> of Judah יֹשְׁבִים֩ <WH3427> sat אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> each עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <WH3678> on his throne מְלֻבָּשִׁ֤ים <WH3847> having put on בְּגָדִים֙ <WH899> their robes בְּגֹ֔רֶן <WH1637> in a void place פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> in the entrance שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> and all הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> and all the prophets מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֖ים <WH5012> prophesied לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> made ל֛וֹ צִדְקִיָּ֥ה <WH6667> And Zedekiah בֶֽן־ <WH1121> the son כְּנַעֲנָ֖ה <WH3668> of Chenaanah קַרְנֵ֣י <WH7161> him horns בַרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> of iron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and he said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these תְּנַגַּ֥ח <WH5055> With these shalt thou push אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> the Syrians עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלֹּתָֽם׃ <WH3615> until thou have consumed

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> And all the prophets נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> prophesied כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> thus לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> so saying עֲלֵ֞ה <WH5927> Go up רָמֹ֤ת <WH7433> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> Gilead וְהַצְלַ֔ח <WH6743> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [it] into the king's

וְהַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <WH4397> And the messenger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָלַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH1980> that was gone לִקְרֹ֣א <WH7121> to call מִיכָ֗יְהוּ <WH4321> Micaiah דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto him saying הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֞א <WH4994> now דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> Behold now the words הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <WH5030> of the prophets פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> mouth אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> with one ט֖וֹב <WH2896> [declare] good אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> become נָ֣א <WH4994> Please [דִבְרֵיךָ כ] (דְבָרְךָ֗ <WH1697> your word ק) כִּדְבַ֛ר <WH1697> let thy word אַחַ֥ד <WH259> of one מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> of them וְדִבַּ֥רְתָּ <WH1696> of them and speak טּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [that which is] good

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said מִיכָ֑יְהוּ <WH4321> And Micaiah חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD כִּ֠י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יֹאמַ֧ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> what the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> unto me that will I speak

וַיָּבוֹא֮ <WH935> So he came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> to the king וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him מִיכָ֙יְהוּ֙ <WH4321> unto him Micaiah הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle אִם־ <WH518> or נֶחְדָּ֑ל <WH2308> or shall we forbear וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> ? And he answered אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> him Go וְהַצְלַ֔ח <WH6743> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king עַד־ <WH5704> against כַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> how long פְעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> unto him How many times אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I מַשְׁבִּעֶ֑ךָ <WH7650> shall I adjure אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> to me לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nothing תְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> thee that thou tell אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about רַק־ <WH7535> but אֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> me nothing but [that which is] true בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> all Israel נְפֹצִ֣ים <WH6327> scattered אֶל־ <WH413> on הֶהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> upon the hills כַּצֹּ֕אן <WH6629> as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֵין־ <WH369> have לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like רֹעֶ֑ה <WH7462> that have not a shepherd וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have no אֲדֹנִ֣ים <WH113> These have no master לָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> These יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> let them return אִישׁ־ <WH376> every man לְבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> to his house בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> unto Jehoshaphat הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> Did I not tell אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about לֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not יִתְנַבֵּ֥א <WH5012> thee that he would prophesy עָלַ֛י <WH5921> concerning ט֖וֹב <WH2896> no good כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo רָֽע׃ <WH7451> adversity

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> Therefore שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> thou therefore the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> sitting עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> on his throne וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צְבָ֤א <WH6635> and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> standing עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> on מִימִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> by him on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <WH8040> and on his left

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD מִ֤י <WH4310> Who יְפַתֶּה֙ <WH6601> Who shall persuade אֶת־ <WH853> אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> Ahab וְיַ֕עַל <WH5927> that he may go up וְיִפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and fall בְּרָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and another said זֶה֙ <WH2088> another בְּכֹ֔ה <WH3541> on this manner וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> another אֹמֵ֖ר <WH559> said בְּכֹֽה׃ <WH3541> on that manner

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> And there came forth הָר֗וּחַ <WH7307> a spirit וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֲפַתֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6601> I will persuade וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> and said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about בַּמָּֽה׃ <WH3964> what

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> said אֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> I will go forth וְהָיִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1961> become ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> and I will be a lying בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> in the mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> of all נְבִיאָ֑יו <WH5030> of all his prophets וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> unto him Wherewith? And he said תְּפַתֶּה֙ <WH6601> Thou shalt persuade וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also תּוּכָ֔ל <WH3201> [him] and prevail צֵ֖א <WH3318> also go forth וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> after that

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> hath put יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Now therefore behold the LORD ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lying בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> in the mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> of all נְבִיאֶ֣יךָ <WH5030> of all these thy prophets אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> against רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil
